author: ate
msg: Added defaultLanguage configuration to LocalizationValveImpl which can be set through Spring.

author: ate
msg: Bumped up and brought in line the version for the jstl and taglibs:standard dependencies to 1.0.6 (they are related).
Some of the projects (like pam) still used old taglibs:standard 1.0.2 which fails to handle locale formatting

author: ate
msg: As I've put in a lot of effort to get the JPetstore demo running as a Portlet, I'd kinda like it to show it off to the public right away and not from behind a login  ;-)
